Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class DepotsExt

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.constant.model.Depots
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.DepotsExt
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observable<Message>
public class DepotsExt
extends Depots
implements Observable<Message>
Depots class Ext. Extends Depots and implements Observable interface. Manage all the resource that a player store during the game.
